did.unittitle: Brooklyn Bureau of Permits transit receipts
did.abstract: One bound volume containing 1890 transit receipts for the Brooklyn Bureau of Permits for moving and transporting corpses. The records themselves contain the name, age, cause of death, and cemetery name for each body transported.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1978.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Brooklyn Bureau of Permits transit receipts, 1978.117, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One bound volume containing transit receipts, dated 1890, for the Brooklyn Bureau of Permits for moving and transporting corpses. The records themselves contain the name, age, cause of death, and cemetery name for each body transported.
